words.definition: An expression of mirth particular to the human species; the sound heard in laughing; laughter.
The act, process or ability of concentrating; the process of becoming concentrated, or the state of being concentrated.
A person or group of people constituting a particular side in a contract or legal action.
The act of vibrating or the condition of being vibrated.
Possession by a god; divine inspiration or frenzy.
To allow a portion to remain unused or unconsumed.
Any of various large nonvenomous snakes of the genus Eunectes, found mainly in northern South America. Their length can grow to as much as 5 m (15 ft).
The surroundings of, and influences on, a particular item of interest.
A specific commercial enterprise or establishment.
The state of being conscious or aware; awareness.
A usually alphabetized and explained collection of words e.g. of a particular field, or prepared for a specific purpose, often for learning.
A mammal, Canis familiaris or Canis lupus familiaris, that has been domesticated for thousands of years, of highly variable appearance due to human breeding.
(usually in the plural) That which is deserved or merited; a just punishment or reward
To fill; to replace material that is absent or has been removed.
